entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
